Uses of Class
com.hedera.sdk.transaction.HederaTransaction

  • Packages that use HederaTransaction 
    Package Description
    com.hedera.sdk.account
    Provides classes managing cryptocurrenty accounts in Hedera Hashgraph
    com.hedera.sdk.common
    Provides general classes for entities used throughout the api and to support files, transactions and smart contracts
    com.hedera.sdk.contract
    Provides classes managing smart contracts in Hedera Hashgraph
    com.hedera.sdk.file
    Provides classes to help manage files in Hedera Hashgraph
    com.hedera.sdk.node
    Provides classes to help manage communication with nodes in Hedera Hashgraph
    com.hedera.sdk.query
    Provides classes to help manage queries in Hedera Hashgraph
    com.hedera.sdk.transaction
    Provides classes to help manage transactions in Hedera Hashgraph

    • Uses of HederaTransaction in com.hedera.sdk.account

      Methods in com.hedera.sdk.account with parameters of type HederaTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean HederaAccount.getBalance​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get the account balance of the given account If successful, the method populates the balance property of the account, cost and state proof if requested
      boolean HederaAccount.getBalanceAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the balance of the account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the balance property of the account and cost
      boolean HederaAccount.getBalanceStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the balance of the account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the balance property of the account, cost and stateproof
      boolean HederaAccount.getInfo​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get information for a given account If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaAccount.getInfoAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given account, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the properties this object
      boolean HederaAccount.getInfoStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given account, requesting a stateproof If successful, the method populates the properties this object including a state proof
      boolean HederaAccount.getRecords​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof if requested
      boolean HederaAccount.getRecords​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType, HederaAccountID accountID)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof if requested
      boolean HederaAccount.getRecordsAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account without a state proof If successful, the method sets the records property and cost
      boolean HederaAccount.getRecordsStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get records attached to an account with a state proof If successful, the method sets the records property, cost and state proof

    • Uses of HederaTransaction in com.hedera.sdk.common

      Methods in com.hedera.sdk.common with parameters of type HederaTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean HederaKeyPair.getEntities​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get entities related to this key from the Hedera Network If successful, the method populates the entityIDs, cost and stateProof for this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaKeySignature.getEntities​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get entities related to this key from the Hedera Network If successful, the method populates the entityIDs, cost and stateProof for this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaKeyPair.getEntitiesAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the entities related to this key from the network, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the entityIDs and cost for this object
      boolean HederaKeySignature.getEntitiesAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the entities related to this key from the network, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the entityIDs and cost for this object
      boolean HederaKeyPair.getEntitiesStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the entities related to this key from the network, requesting a state proof If successful, the method populates the entityIDs,state proof and cost for this object
      boolean HederaKeySignature.getEntitiesStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the entities related to this key from the network, requesting a state proof If successful, the method populates the entityIDs,state proof and cost for this object

    • Uses of HederaTransaction in com.hedera.sdk.contract

      Methods in com.hedera.sdk.contract with parameters of type HederaTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean HederaContract.callLocal​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node) If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaContract.callLocalAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node), requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the properties this object
      boolean HederaContract.callLocalStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to call a smart contract function locally (on a node), requesting a stateproof If successful, the method populates the properties this object including a state proof
      boolean HederaContract.getByteCode​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get the bytecode for a given smart contract If successful, the method populates the bytecode, cost and stateProof for this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaContract.getByteCodeAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the bytecode for the smart contract, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the bytecode and cost for this object
      boolean HederaContract.getByteCodeStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Gets the bytecode for the smart contract, requesting a state proof If successful, the method populates the bytecode, stateproof and cost for this object
      boolean HederaContract.getInfo​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get information for a given smart contract If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaContract.getInfoAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given smart contract, requesting only an answer If successful, the method populates the properties this object
      boolean HederaContract.getInfoStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get information for a given smart contract, requesting a stateproof If successful, the method populates the properties this object including a state proof

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean HederaFile.getContents​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get the contents of a given file If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaFile.getContentsAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get the contents of a given file without a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost and contents of this object
      boolean HederaFile.getContentsStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get the contents of a given file with a state proof If successful, the method populates the cost, stateproof and contents of this object
      boolean HederaFile.getInfo​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Runs a query to get the information about a given file If successful, the method populates the properties this object depending on the type of answer requested
      boolean HederaFile.getInfoAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get the contents of a given file without a state proof If successful, the method populates the properties of this object
      boolean HederaFile.getInfoStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment)
      Runs a query to get the contents of a given file with a state proof If successful, the method populates the properties of this object

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.accountCreate​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to create an account and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.accountTransfer​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to transfer tokens from an account to another and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.accountUpdate​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to transfer tokens from an account to another and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.addClaim​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to add a claim to an account and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.contractCall​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to call a smart contract function and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.contractCreate​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to create a smart contract instance and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.contractUpdate​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to create a smart contract instance and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.fileAppend​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to append to a file and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.fileCreate​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to create a file and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.fileDelete​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to delete a file and returns the result of the request
      HederaTransactionResult HederaNode.fileUpdate​(HederaTransaction transaction)
      Sends a transaction to a node to update a file and returns the result of the request

    • Uses of HederaTransaction in com.hedera.sdk.transaction

      Methods in com.hedera.sdk.transaction with parameters of type HederaTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean HederaTransaction.getRecord​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaTransactionID transactionID, HederaQueryHeader.QueryResponseType responseType)
      Get the record for a transaction.
      boolean HederaTransaction.getRecordAnswerOnly​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaTransactionID transactionID)
      Get the record for a transaction without a state proof If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it.
      boolean HederaTransaction.getRecordStateProof​(HederaTransaction payment, HederaTransactionID transactionID)
      Get the record for a transaction with a state proof If the transaction requested a record, then the record lasts for one hour, and a state proof is available for it.
